ziher.validating: Every time a file is opened or saved the executable is called to validate the code(Lint)
ziher.compilerExecutable: complete path of the ziher executable
ziher.extraOptions: other options to pass to ziher compiler
ziher.extraIncludePaths: Extra include paths to use during the compilation (for include)
ziher.decorator: Enables the decoration of correspondents if/endif, for/next, while/endwhile, etc etc
ziher.workspaceDepth: Depth of sub-folder of workspace where looking for sources
ziher.configurationSnippetsDesc: Start and debug a ziher program with debug symbols
ziher.configurationSnippetsDesc2: Debug a running ziher program with debug symbols
ziher.launch.sourcePaths: Directories where search for source files
ziher.launch.terminalType: Type of terminal to use to run the application
ziher.launch.port: Port used by debugger, It must be the same value of DBG_PORT in debugger code line 6
ziher.dbgError1: Unable to start {0} in {1}, check that all path exists
ziher.validation.NoExe: Unable to start {0}, check the 'ziher.compilerExecutable' value
